title: so my step dad is a flat earther...
body: hadnt seen him in a year or so, when i talked to him the other day he tried convincing me the earth is flat lol.  told me gravity is a lie, and he had "proof".  you know how the moons gravity causes the tides?  he held a glass of water up and said, "if the moon causes the oceans to move, why is the water in this glass level?  shouldnt it be slanted towards the moon?"  I dont even...
